game_description: Help the stickman defend his castle from the siege weapons of the enemy. Use the slingshot, ballista or cannon to throw stones at the opponents and break their military mechanisms and siege towers. The game has a simple intuitive control. Pull and throw a projectile at the enemy to charge the slingshot and select the tension force. Release to launch the projectile into the enemy. For each struck enemy you will earn coins which help you to upgrades a weapon, turret or your equipment. We are waiting for your wishes and comments on the game. Have a good game!
Languages: English, English (US), English (Australia), English (Canada), English (South Africa), English (UK)
review_1: That's great! I really like to shoot and destroy large objects, this game is exciting with its destruction. I put 5 stars. I have not been able to find a decent game for myself for a long time. Now I play it every day, great for fun.
review_2: No chance to beat the Level 10 Boss. Maybe if you buy ingame coins to upgrade your stuff. lame
